definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: division, course (almost wholly Chr.)—´[[מ]] abs. 1Ch 27:1, 1Ch 27:2; cstr. 1Ch 27:4; sf. [[מַחֲלֻקְתּוֹ]] 1Ch 27:2 + 14 t. 1Ch 27; abs. [[מַחְלְקוֹת]] 1Ch 23:6 + 6 t. Ch + 1Sa 23:28 (v. infr.); cstr. id. 1Ch 26:12 + 5 t. Ch + Ne 11:36; sf. [[מַחְלְקוֹתֵיכֶם]] 2Ch 35:4; [[מַחְלְקוֹתֵיהֶם]] 2Ch 31:16, 2Ch 31:17; [[מַחְלְקוֹתָם]] 1Ch 24:1 + 3 t. in Ch; [[מַחְלְקׂתָם]] Jos 11:23, Jos 12:7, Jos 18:10, Ez Eze 48:29; —
division, part, of land assigned to the several tribes of Isr. Jos 11:23, Jos 12:7 ( both D) Jos 18:10 (JE; others, divisions of Isr., but v.) Ez Eze 48:29.

techn. term of organization of priests and Levites (late), 1Ch 23:6, 1Ch 24:1, 1Ch 26:1, 1Ch 26:12, 1Ch 26:19, 2Ch 8:14, 2Ch 8:14, 2Ch 31:2; 2Ch 31:2, 2Ch 35:4, 2Ch 35:10, Ne 11:36 + 26 t. in Ch.—[[סֶלַע הַמַּחְלְקוֹת]] n.pr. 1Sa 23:28 was popularly connected with this √, = rock of divisions, where Saul and David parted from neighbourhood of each other (Dr) so Vrss Th al.; Bö Klo, where their forces lay divided from each other; orig. connex. was perh. with II. [[חלק]], smooth, slippery; Ges De W Ke al. expl. here as rock of escapes, but this meaning for [[חלק]] dubious.
